***Special Notes***:  This plugin requires the subscription of OpenAI's API. If you prefer not to use API, download this plugin instead: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/chatgpt-enhancer-for-exte/miballmeadddlcjmiicbopgoogickgjg 

This plugin, integrated with ChatGPT, serves as a versatile AI writing assistant to enhance your digital communication and content creation. With a focus on optimizing, responding to, and rewriting selected text, it offers an accessible solution for users seeking to improve the quality, coherence, and responsiveness of their written content. This tool functions as a rewriting tool, grammar checker, translator, and email assistant, designed to meet a variety of text optimization needs.

Features:

1. Full Automation: Say goodbye to manual copy-pasting. This plugin automatically transfers selected text to ChatGPT's API and inserts the AI-generated output back into your text area. This automation saves you time and effort, making your workflow seamless.

2. Prompt Storage and Retrieval: Save your frequently used prompts and retrieve them easily. This feature ensures you have quick access to your most important commands, further enhancing your workflow efficiency.

3. Sentence Rewriter:
    - Enhance clarity, grammar, and style of the selected text.
    - Suggest synonyms and rephrase sentences for better flow.
    - Tailor content for different audiences and tones.

4. Automated Responses:
    - Generate contextually relevant replies to selected text.
    - Save time with quick and intelligent responses for emails, messages, and social media.
    - Customize response preferences to suit individual communication styles.

5. Integration with ChatGPT:
    - Leverage the power of ChatGPT for natural language understanding and generation.
    - Access high-quality content and suggestions.  
    - Benefit from continuous updates and improvements from OpenAI.

6. User Privacy Protection:
    - Users will utilize their own API keys, ensuring that their privacy is fully protected.
    - Maintain control over personal information and data usage.
